scripts.optim¶

Module Contents¶

Classes¶

Particle

This class is for use in the ParticleSwarm class and is an individual

ParticleSwarm

class scripts.optim.Particle(x0)¶

This class is for use in the ParticleSwarm class and is an individual particle in a swarm used for optimization.

Parameters

x0 (list of float) – This is the inital position of the particle.

p_i¶

List of positions.

Type

list

v_i¶

List of velocities.

Type

list

p_best_i¶

List of best position.

Type

list

err_best_i¶

Best error value.

Type

float

err_i¶

List of errors over iterations.

Type

list

num_dims¶

Number of dimension in optimization problem.

Type

int

evaluate_particle(self, loss_func)¶

This function evaluates the loss function for this particle instance amd updates if the particle position is the best opserved so far and what the associated error is.

Parameters

loss_func (Python function) – Loss or cost function for evalutating the particles fitness.

velocity_update(self, p_best_g)¶

This function updates the velocity of the particle based on the intertia cognative constant and the social constant.

Parameters

p_best_g (list of float) – Best position for the entire particle swarm group.

position_update(self, bounds)¶

This function updates the position of particle for a given itertion of the optimization procedure.

Parameters

bounds (list of tuples) – This is a list of the defined bounds for each feature in the optimization problem.

class scripts.optim.ParticleSwarm(loss_func, x0, bounds, num_particles, max_iter)¶
optimize(self)¶

This method runs the optimization procedure defined in the initialization of the class instance. This function takes no arguments, as it is just running based on the paramters given in the initalization of the class instance.

Returns

Best particle position or the best values

of the hyperparamters being tuned.

err_best_g (float): Loss function value at the best particle position.

Return type

p_best_g (list of floats)
